---
title: "Routine to download input data"
---


## Install packages

```{r packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())

if(!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman"); library(pacman)
p_load(here)
```

## Download data from Zenodo

```{r download}
download.file(url = "https://zenodo.org/records/18172827/files/Stavanger_input_data.zip", destfile = here("input_data", "Stavanger_input_data.zip"))
unzip(zipfile = here("input_data", "Stavanger_input_data.zip"), exdir = here("input_data"))
file.remove(here("input_data", "Stavanger_input_data.zip"))
```
